name: SUPER MUSH RUSH
description:
chums love to mush - match at least 3 in a row to fuel your team to the finish line!

CONTROLS:

Player One:
WASD - move cursor
Space - swap

Player Two:
Arrow Keys - move cursor
Enter - swap

Use space or enter to advance menus. 

Code / Design - dicegameuchiha
Art - lily p (instagram)
Music - david galvin
